text: Gumazir mam iti, an ziam Jabes. An araziba bar deragha uan aveghbuabar araziba bar dagh afira. Ezɨ gumazamiziba bar an ziam fe. Jabesɨn amebam a batir dughiamɨn, a bar mɨzazir ekiam ini. Kamaghɨn amizɨma, a ziam Jabes, a gatɨ.4:9 Hibrun akamɨn ziar kam Jabes, a mong akar otevir kam ko voroghɨra ghu, “Mɨzazim.”
